user_request: Empty the shopping cart on newegg.com. Add logitech g pro to the cart on newegg.com, then select checkout.
last_action: click on the trash bin icon (means a delete icon) located at the left and lower part of the screen.
reflect_result:
By clicking on the trash bin icon, the item "Refurbished: Dell Alienware m15 R4 15.6" Full HD Laptop" has been removed from the cart, which has emptied the shopping cart as requested. The "Cart Empty" screen now appears, confirming that there are no items in the cart.

This action directly helps progress the user request by fulfilling the first part: emptying the shopping cart on Newegg. The next step would involve adding the Logitech G Pro to the cart and proceeding to checkout, which can be done by continuing to shop and adding the required item.
